name: Pathscaper
description:
Pathscaper is a top-down 2D game based on the Norwegian Mountain code #2: Adapt the planned routes according to ability and conditions.

The goal is to move from point A to Z through a challenging landscape. Use abilities to destroy the obstacles in your way, or build a new path - but spend your resources wisely!

CREDITS

I (Titanelie/Maja Bjørnaas Hoem), was:

  • Project Manager
  • Designer

The music and art does not belong to me.
